price: 64. Diggah Yalli koros abaareeh, isi racamatak ken yeyxeereh addunyaay akeeral, kaadu saqiir deqsitta giráy habuubugta keenih massoyse akeeral,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ سَعِيرًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha laʿana al-kāfirīna wa-aʿadda lahum saʿīran
